message: Now that there is the Tec-9, a crappy spray gun from South Miami.
This gun is advertised as the most popular gun in American crime.
It actually says that in the little book that comes with it: the most popular gun in American crime.
Like they're actually proud of that shit.
Now that we know who you are, I know who I am.
I'm not a mistake! It all makes sense!
In a comic, you know how you can tell who the arch-villain's going to be?
He's the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you and me!
I should've known way back when... You know why, David? Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.
